Boost hydration, elasticity, and firmness daily or after microneedling for smoother, balanced skin.

A gentle yet effective way to support luminous, balanced skin at any age.

STRENGTHENS BARRIER & SHIELDS AGAINST ENVIRONMENTAL DAMAGE:This collagen peptide serum not only hydrates but helps strengthen your skin’s natural barrier to lock in moisture and improve resilience. By reinforcing the skin barrier, it defends against dryness and environmental stressors, preventing water loss and supporting long-term skin health. Leaves skin visibly plumper, more elastic, and revitalized over time.
